frontmatter.title: How to reverse a string in JavaScript
frontmatter.excerpt: In this short tutorial, I'll show you how to reverse a string in JavaScript.

video.name: How to reverse a string in JavaScript

steps.name: Create a string
steps.text: Create a string using double quotes, single quotes or back quotes.

steps.name: Convert the string to an array of characters
steps.text: Use the spread operator (...) inside square brackets to create an array of characters.

steps.name: Reverse the array
steps.text: Use the .reverse() method to reverse the array.

steps.name: Convert the array back into a string
steps.text: Use the .join() method with empty quotes to recombine the array into a string

steps.name: Assign the result to a variable
steps.text: Reversing a string is not permanent. Assign the result to a variable if you want the change to persist.
